text: Florence Foresti (; born 8 November 1973) is a French comedian and actress. She appeared in the Stéphane Bern programme 20h 10 pétantes, and then on Laurent Ruquier's On a tout essayé. In 2016, she hosted the 41st César Awards. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Lenombrildumonde.com Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:French comedians Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: Florence Foresti
